alert.note: Alert for Dukes (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 14 at 1:42PM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation abo ve ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.4 to 4.2 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Dukes MA County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Only minor inundation and erosion is expected around the time of high tide early Wednesday morning. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Vineyard Haven MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 14/06 AM 3.6/ 4.1 1.6/ 2.0 2.2/ 2.7 5-6 None 14/05 PM 2.6/ 3.1 0.6/ 1.1 1.4/ 1.9 6 None 15/06 AM 3.2/ 3.7 1.2/ 1.7 1.7/ 2.2 4-5 None 15/06 PM 2.3/ 2.8 0.4/ 0.9 1.2/ 1.7 3 None 16/07 AM 2.7/ 3.2 0.7/ 1.1 1.2/ 1.7 2-3 None 16/07 PM 2.3/ 2.8 0.4/ 0.9 1.2/ 1.7 1-2 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
